results.title: Efficacy and safety of pravastatin vs simvastatin after cardiac transplantation.
results.text_hl: Prior studies of cardiac transplant recipients have shown that @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ reduces 12-month rejection and mortality after cardiac transplantation and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces 4-year mortality, low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol levels, and @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@intimal thickening@@@.

citations.NLM: Keogh A, Macdonald P, Kaan A, Aboyoun C, Spratt P, Mundy J. Efficacy and safety of pravastatin vs simvastatin after cardiac transplantation. J Heart Lung Transplant. 2000 Jun;19(6):529-37. PMID: 10867332
citations.BibTeX: @article{10867332, title={Efficacy and safety of pravastatin vs simvastatin after cardiac transplantation.}, author={Keogh A and Macdonald P and Kaan A and Aboyoun C and Spratt P and Mundy J}, journal={J Heart Lung Transplant}, volume={19}, number={6}, pages={529-37}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces graft vessel disease and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial.
results.text_hl: Intracoronary ultrasound performed after 4 years in a subgroup of 27 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 10; control, 17) showed less @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@intimal thickening@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with LDL-cholesterol levels of <110 mg/dL (170+/-84 versus 370+/-171 microm, P=.04) and a lower intimal index (13.8+/-7.1% versus 27.9+/-12.1%,P=.04).

citations.NLM: Wenke K, Meiser B, Thiery J, Nagel D, von Scheidt W, Steinbeck G, Seidel D, Reichart B. Simvastatin reduces graft vessel disease and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial. Circulation. 1997 Sep 2;96(5):1398-402. PMID: 9315523
citations.BibTeX: @article{9315523, title={Simvastatin reduces graft vessel disease and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial.}, author={Wenke K and Meiser B and Thiery J and Nagel D and von Scheidt W and Steinbeck G and Seidel D and Reichart B}, journal={Circulation}, volume={96}, number={5}, pages={1398-402}}

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits cytokine production and nuclear factor-kB activation in interleukin 1beta-stimulated synoviocytes from rheumatoid arthritis patients.
results.text_hl: Our results further support the rationale for the use of statins in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Synovitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013585 @@@rheumatoid synovitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Lazzerini PE, Lorenzini S, Selvi E, Capecchi PL, Chindamo D, Bisogno S, Ghittoni R, Natale MR, Caporali F, Giuntini S, Marcolongo R, Galeazzi M, Laghi-Pasini F. Simvastatin inhibits cytokine production and nuclear factor-kB activation in interleukin 1beta-stimulated synoviocytes from rheumatoid arthritis patients. Clin Exp Rheumatol. 2007 Sep-Oct;25(5):696-700. PMID: 18078616
